metadata.title: ArbetsYtan — Project Management for Craftspeople
metadata.description: Project management with AI assistance for craftspeople. Manage projects, files and teams in one place.

deleteConfirmation.title: Confirm deletion
deleteConfirmation.description: The following {type} will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.

excelEditor.title: Edit Excel
excelEditor.description: Editing {fileName}. The original will not be changed — saved as a new file.

email.description: Send emails to team members or external recipients

inbox.emptyInboxDescription: Send a new message from the Compose tab.

billing.canceledWarning: Your subscription has been canceled. Data is preserved but access to features is restricted.

push.description: Receive push alerts when tasks are assigned and when deadlines are close.

Click here to set a new password

auth.resetLinkSentMessage: If an account with that email exists, we have sent a link. Check your inbox.

invitations.errorAlreadyInvited: There is already a pending invitation for this email address.

invitations.errorForbidden: You do not have permission to send invitations.

invitations.emailBody:

Click here to accept the invitation

This link is valid for 7 days.

invitations.loginToAccept: Log in to accept the invitation

errors.notFound: The page could not be found.

hero.title: Smarter project management for your craft business
hero.description: Bring projects, files, team and AI assistance together in one place. ArbetsYtan is built for electricians, plumbers, painters, builders and all other craftspeople.
hero.trial: 14-day free trial — no credit card required

features.title: Everything you need to run your business
features.description: ArbetsYtan brings together the tools that make your workday easier.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Kanban board with drag and drop. Keep track of all tasks, deadlines and statuses across your projects.

fileManagement.title: File Management
fileManagement.description: Upload blueprints, documents and images. Everything organized and collected per project.

aiAssistant.title: AI Assistant
aiAssistant.description: Read blueprints, summarize documents, write quotes and get help with most things — right in the app.

teamCollaboration.title: Team Collaboration
teamCollaboration.description: Invite your team, assign tasks and follow up on work. Each role sees what is relevant.

timeTracking.title: Time Tracking
timeTracking.description: Track time per task and project. Export as PDF or Excel for easy invoicing.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Automatic reminders for inactivity and real-time updates so nothing falls through the cracks.

howItWorks.title: Get started in three steps
howItWorks.description: It only takes a few minutes to get going.

step1.title: Sign up
step1.description: Create your account for free. No credit card required.

step2.title: Create your first project
step2.description: Add project details, tasks and upload relevant files.

step3.title: Invite your team
step3.description: Send invitations to your colleagues and start collaborating right away.

pricing.title: Simple and transparent pricing
pricing.description: Start for free and upgrade when you need to.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large organizations with special needs.

socialProof.title: Craftspeople already using ArbetsYtan
socialProof.description: See what our customers say about the platform.

testimonials.quote: ArbetsYtan has completely changed how we manage our projects. Everything is in one place and the AI assistant saves us hours every week.
testimonials.name: Erik Johansson

testimonials.quote: Finally a project management app that understands how we craftspeople work. Easy to use and the team got started right away.
testimonials.name: Maria Lindström

testimonials.quote: We are still testing but already see how much time we save by having blueprints, tasks and communication in one place.
testimonials.name: Anders Bergqvist

cta.title: Ready to streamline your craft business?
cta.description: Get started for free today. No credit card required.

footer.tagline: Project management with AI assistance for craftspeople.
